rentals.description: It is a sleek and light-weight scooter that carries one person. This scooter as our most popular package. It uses very little gas.
It is a moderate-sized scooter that can comfortably carry two people. It is perfect for short-distance drives.
It is a moderate-sized scooter that can comfortably carry two people longer distances. It has a higher top-speed and carries a little more horsepower than the Dio.
It is the complete off-road package. It can take you and your family or friends to many off-road destinations.
It is a top-performing vehicle that can sustain highway speeds as well as handle off-road terrain.
It is the premium package for on-road and off-road performance. It includes air-conditioning to keep you and your guests comfortable the entire day.
